RubixCube
=========

Python GUI Rubix Cube Solver

Author : [David Grethlein](https://davidgrethlein.dev) :nerd_face: :cowboy_hat_face: :robot:

CS 530 : Developing User Interfaces
Final Project Rubix Cube Python GUI
